description:
8.19 aemphasis
Audio emphasis filter creates or restores material directly taken from LPs or
emphased CDs with different filter curves. E.g. to store music on vinyl the
signal has to be altered by a filter first to even out the disadvantages of
this recording medium.
Once the material is played back the inverse filter has to be applied to
restore the distortion of the frequency response.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: aemphasis

options.description: Set filter mode. For restoring material use reproduction mode, otherwise use production mode. Default is reproduction mode.
options.name: mode

options.description:
Set filter type. Selects medium. Can be one of the following:

col

select Columbia.

emi

select EMI.

bsi

select BSI (78RPM).

riaa

select RIAA.

cd

select Compact Disc (CD).

50fm

select 50µs (FM).

75fm

select 75µs (FM).

50kf

select 50µs (FM-KF).

75kf

select 75µs (FM-KF).
options.name: type
